mode_lite_description.message: Even in case of fast access speed、<abbr title="「蝦米」「酷六」「迅雷」">「蝦米」</abbr>etc. limit to a minority of websites

mode_normal_description.message: Since access speed is stable, most websites are easy to browse. We recommend it.

mode_redirect_description.message: Even in case of extremely slow access speed、you can still use system proxy server

help.message: If you need help with any of the above modes, please click here and have a look.

feedback.message: If you have any questions or need advise、don't hesitate to contact us at any time

rating.message: If you find this plugin helpful、please rate it.
